languages.text: "Император велит нам твердо принимать удары судьбы. Пускай другие ульи не хотят принимать несчастных, ставших жертвой трагедии — так пусть пострадавшие сами станут им уроком стойкости и устыдят их. Уверена, Экклезиархия поможет беглецам обустроить лагеря выживания в пустошах, общины гордых мучеников-пустынников. Суровые условия станут горнилом стойкости и бесстрашия, и беда обернется духовным подвигом".

"The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the blows of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not want to accept the unfortunate victims of the tragedy , then let the victims themselves teach them a lesson in resilience and shame them. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will help the refugees build the survival camps in the wastelands and establish a community of proud martyrs of the desert. Harsh conditions will be the crucible of resilience and fearlessness, and the tragedy will become a feat of the spirit."

languages.text: “帝皇教导我们，要心怀尊严迎接命运的残酷打击。如果其他巢都不希望接受在这场悲剧中不幸受害的人，那么，就让那些受害者亲自给那些生活在巢都里的人上一节关于坚韧与谦虚的课程吧。我相信国教可以协助难民建造营地，在废土中生存在下来，重新建起令他们自豪的沙漠殉道者社区。这样的严酷条件会成为一场考验，激发他们坚韧与无畏的决心。这场悲剧将会铸就他们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇教导我们，要心怀尊严迎接命运的残酷打击。如果其他巢都不希望接受在这场悲剧中不幸受害的人，那么，就让那些受害者亲自给那些生活在巢都里的人上一节关于坚韧与谦虚的课程吧。我相信国教可以协助难民建造营地，在废土中生存在下来，重新建起令他们自豪的沙漠殉道者社区。这样的严酷条件会成为一场考验，激发他们坚韧与无畏的决心。这场悲剧将会铸就他们的灵魂。”

languages.text: «El Emperador nos pide que afrontemos con dignidad los golpes, a menudo crueles, del destino. Si las otras colmenas no desean aceptar a las desafortunadas víctimas de esta tragedia, entonces dejemos que las propias víctimas enseñen a los que viven en las colmenas una lección de resistencia y humildad. Estoy seguro de que la Eclesiarquía ayudará a los refugiados a construir campamentos para sobrevivir en los páramos y establecer una comunidad de orgullosos mártires del desierto. Unas condiciones tan duras serán un crisol de fortaleza e intrepidez, esta tragedia una proeza del espíritu».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

Unas condiciones tan duras serán un crisol de fortaleza e intrepidez, esta tragedia una proeza del espíritu».

languages.text: 「皇帝は私たちに、何度も生じる残酷な運命に威厳をもって立ち向かうよう命じている。他のハイヴがこの悲劇が生んだ不幸な犠牲者を受け入れたくないのであれば、犠牲者自身で、そのハイヴの住人に再生力と謙虚な心を教えさせよう。帝国聖教会が、難民がウエストランドで生き延びるための野営地を設置し、砂漠に住む誇り高き殉教者のコミュニティを設立する援助を行うだろう。このような過酷な状況は、不屈で恐れ知らずの精神を養う坩堝となり、悲劇を精神の偉業へと変えるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は私たちに、何度も生じる残酷な運命に威厳をもって立ち向かうよう命じている。他のハイヴがこの悲劇が生んだ不幸な犠牲者を受け入れたくないのであれば、犠牲者自身で、そのハイヴの住人に再生力と謙虚な心を教えさせよう。帝国聖教会が、難民がウエストランドで生き延びるための野営地を設置し、砂漠に住む誇り高き殉教者のコミュニティを設立する援助を行うだろう。このような過酷な状況は、不屈で恐れ知らずの精神を養う坩堝となり、悲劇を精神の偉業へと変えるはずだ」

languages.text: « L'Empereur nous demande d'affronter les coups du sort avec dignité. Si les autres ruches refusent d'accepter les infortunées victimes de cette tragédie, laissons ces dernières leur donner une leçon de résilience et d'humilité. De son côté, l'Ecclésiarchie aidera les réfugiés à construire des camps qui leur permettront de survivre dans les terres désolées et à y établir une communauté de fiers martyrs du désert... De telles conditions formeront un véritable creuset de force d'âme et de courage, et de cette tragédie naîtra un exploit de l'esprit ! »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

De son côté, l'Ecclésiarchie aidera les réfugiés à construire des camps qui leur permettront de survivre dans les terres désolées et à y établir une communauté de fiers martyrs du désert... De telles conditions formeront un véritable creuset de force d'âme et de courage, et de cette tragédie naîtra un exploit de l'esprit ! »

languages.text: "Der Imperator fordert von uns, dass wir die oft grausamen Launen des Schicksals würdevoll erdulden. Wenn die anderen Makropolen die bemitleidenswerte Opfer dieser Tragödie nicht aufnehmen wollen, dann sollen die Opfer selbst den Bewohnern dieser Makropolen eine Lektion in Widerstandsfähigkeit und Demut erteilen. Die Ekklesiarchie hilft den Flüchtlingen gewiss beim Bau von Lagern, um im Ödland zu überleben und eine Gemeinschaft stolzer, in der Wüste lebender Märtyrer zu begründen. Solch raue Bedingungen werden als Esse dienen, in der Stärke und Furchtlosigkeit geschmiedet werden, diese Tragödie ist ein Erfolg des Willens."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."

languages.text: "İmparator, kaderin çoğu zaman acımasız saldırılarına karşı onurlu bir şekilde durmamızı emreder. Eğer ki diğer kovanlar bu trajedinin talihsiz kurbanlarını kabul etmek istemiyorsa bırakalım da kurbanlar, kovanlarda yaşayanlara bir dayanıklılık ve tevazu dersi versin. Ekleşiarşi'nin inşa kamplarındaki mültecilere çorak topraklarda hayatta kalmaları ve çölde yaşayan gururlu mazlumlar olarak bir topluluk kurmaları için yardım edeceğinden eminim. Bu zorlu koşullar, metanet ve korkusuzluk imtihanı olacaktır. Bu trajediyle de ruhlarının yiğitliği kanıtlanacak."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor bids us to face the often cruel strokes of fate with dignity. If the other hives do not wish to accept the unfortunate victims of this tragedy, then let the victims themselves teach those living in the hives a lesson in resilience and humility. I'm sure that the Ecclesiarchy will aid the refugees in constructing camps to survive out in the wastelands and establish a community of proud desert-dwelling martyrs. Such harsh conditions will be a crucible of fortitude and fearlessness, this tragedy a feat of spirit."
